channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report X-2025010568
item.description:
Report X-2025010568

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-22
  • City: GARY
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1488000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Train 6K4B323 derailed 8 cars at milepost CP 500. The derailment involved tank car NATX301714. The derailment caused the BOV nipple to be sheared off. The BOV remained closed but product bypassed the valve. The valve opening was plugged to stop the leak.
